item.title: Flask
item.description: Setup Create a virtual environment $ python -m venv /path/to/new/virtual/environment #OR $ py -m venv /path/to/new/virtual/environment Activate the virtual environment $ cd venv_folder/Scripts $ activate.bat Come back to flask app root dir $ cd .. $ cd .. $ pwd #my_flask_app Install Flask $ pip install flask Flask Basic App Module Structure from flask import Flask app = Flask(__name__) #app routes go here if __name__ == '__main__': app.
